comments.author: Bttzed03
comments.body: Quote from: newnft on May 07, 2022, 01:35:47 PM~are they really fully decentralized ? or just fact that using crypto makes them "decentralized "If these games are hosted on centralized servers and if developers can change the contract to block any wallet/account, the answer is obviously not fully decentralized. Most projects allows users to connect to their platform directly from their wallet but that still doesn't mean it's decentralized. The right term would have been non-custodial but it looks like the majority doesn't care about that.
